[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse args: %m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:        else[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mlog_info[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr == [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"Done!"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"Action!"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_stdout_fd >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35massert_se[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mfreopen[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mFORMAT_PROC_FD_PATH[0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_stdout_fd[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m"w"[0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mrelease_busses[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* We open the bus for communication with logind.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                           * It needs to be closed to avoid apparent leaks. *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmac_selinux_finish[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Call static destructors to do global state cleanup. We do it here, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand not in fuzz-main.c so that[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:         * any global state is destroyed between fuzzer runs. *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/static-destruct.h:[0m[1;36m49[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m63[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvariable, func[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m \[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35m_STATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39mUNIQ, variable, func[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35m_STATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39muq, variable, func[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                 \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Type-safe destructor *[0m[35m/[0m[39m                                      \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:        static void [0m[1;35mUNIQ_T[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstatic_destructor_wrapper, uq[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m    \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mtypeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvariable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *q = p;                                \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mfunc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;                                                \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m                                                               \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:        _common_static_destruct_attrs_                                  \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        static const StaticDestructor [0m[1;35mUNIQ_T[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstatic_destructor_entry, uq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m \[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:                .type = STATIC_DESTRUCTOR_SIMPLE,                       \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:                .simple.data = &[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvariable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,                             \[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:                .simple.destroy = [0m[1;35mUNIQ_T[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstatic_destructor_wrapper, uq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, \[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/static-destruct.h:[0m[1;36m86[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m105[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:static inline void [0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!__start_SYSTEMD_STATIC_DESTRUCT[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:                return;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst StaticDestructor *d = [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mALIGN_PTR[0m[1;39m([0m[39m__start_SYSTEMD_STATIC_DESTRUCT[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:             d < __stop_SYSTEMD_STATIC_DESTRUCT;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:             d = [0m[1;35mALIGN_PTR[0m[1;39m([0m[39md + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:                switch [0m[1;39m([0m[39md->type[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:                case STATIC_DESTRUCTOR_SIMPLE:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:                        d->[0m[1;35msimple.destroy[0m[1;39m([0m[39md->simple.data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:                        break;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:                case STATIC_DESTRUCTOR_ARRAY:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m:                        [0m[1;35marray_cleanup[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&d->array[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:                        break;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:                default:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:                        [0m[1;35massert_not_reached[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:                [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m54[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m66[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b, free_func[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m{[0m[39m                                      \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mtypeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m* _a = &[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;           \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mtypeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m* _b = &[0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;           \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mfree_func[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*_a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;                 \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:                *_a = *_b;                      \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:                *_b = NULL;                     \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:                [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;                              \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                  \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b, free[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m98[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m107[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:static inline void [0m[1;35munsetp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* A trivial [0m[32m"destructor"[0m[39m that can be used in cases where we want to[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:         * unset a pointer from a _cleanup_ function. *[0m[35m/[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:        *[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp = NULL;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:static inline void [0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report reveals a **double-free vulnerability** in the systemd fuzzer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcaused by a fundamental mismatch between the static destructor system's design and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzzer's usage pattern. Here's the core issue:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Static Destructor Design Assumption Violation**: The static destructor system [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`STATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was designed for one-time cleanup at process exit, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot for cleanup between fuzzing iterations.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Memory Lifecycle Conflict**: [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Global variables `arg_root` and `arg_image` are registered with [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_root, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which calls `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` but doesn't null[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe pointer[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` uses `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` which frees the old value [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore replacing it[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` runs, these variables point to freed memory [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mdangling pointers[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Next iteration: `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` tries to free already-freed memory → [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**double-free**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **The Issue Sequence**:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Iteration [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - arg_root = NULL[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocates memory[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m frees memory via [0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&arg_root[0m[1;39m)[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - BUT: arg_root still contains the freed address[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Iteration [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - arg_root points to freed memory [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdangling pointer[0m[1;39m)[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This tries to free the dangling pointer → DOUBLE-FREE[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Key Code Insights[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFrom the analysis:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:136[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m137[0m[39m**: Variables registered with static destructors using [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`freep`[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **static-destruct.h:[0m[1;36m95[0m[39m**: Static destruction calls the destructor but doesn't [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcoordinate with variable reuse[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m107[0m[39m**: `[0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` frees memory without nulling the pointer[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **parse-argument.[0m[1;92mc:80[0m[39m**: `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` always frees the old value[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.[0m[1;92mc:74[0m[39m**: Calls `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` between iterations[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39munique usage pattern[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Logic to Preserve[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The static destructor system must remain unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mused throughout codebase for[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocess exit cleanup[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` functionality must not be modified [0m[1;39m([0m[39mused in multiple [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomponents[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The fuzzer must continue to test argument parsing across multiple iterations[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` semantics cannot be changed [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwidespread [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39musage[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Solution: Manual Pointer Reset After Static Destruction in Fuzzer[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe optimal fix is to **manually reset the freed pointers to NULL** after [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in the fuzzer harness. This approach:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Minimal Impact**: Only modifies the fuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot production code[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Preserves All Existing Logic**: No changes to static destructor system or [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory management functions[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause**: Prevents dangling pointers between iterations[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Pattern**: The fuzzer already manually resets `optind` and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`arg_transport` for similar reasons[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Steps[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**In `src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`:**[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter line [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add manual resets for the variables that are:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Registered with static destructors using `freep`[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modified by `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or similar functions that free old values[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSpecifically, reset:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_root` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmodified by `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:732[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_image` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmodified by `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:738[0m[1;39m)[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer should look like:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[39m* Call static destructors to do global state cleanup. We do it here, and not in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz-main.c so that[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * any global state is destroyed between fuzzer runs. *[0m[35m/[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[39m* Reset pointers that were freed by static destructors but might be reused in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnext iteration.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * This prevents double-free when [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tries to free the old [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalue. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_root = NULL;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_image = NULL;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Justification[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why This is Optimal**:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Localized Fix**: Only affects the fuzzer, not production code paths[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Preserves Design**: Doesn't alter the static destructor system which works [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly for its intended use [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprocess exit cleanup[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Safe Pattern**: Explicitly nulling pointers after freeing is a common safety [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpractice[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Consistent with Existing Code**: The fuzzer already has similar manual state [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m55[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m56[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **No Side Effects**: Other code paths don't call `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` multiple [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtimes, so this doesn't affect them[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why Alternatives Are Suboptimal**:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Changing `[0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to null pointers**: Would affect all static destructors [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mglobally and might break assumptions elsewhere[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Removing static destructor registration**: Would leak memory in non-fuzzer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpaths[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Modifying `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`**: Would complicate a widely-used utility [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Not calling `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`**: Would leak resources between iterations and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdefeat the fuzzer's cleanup purpose[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**How It Addresses the Evaluation Report**:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Prevents the double-free by ensuring `arg_root` and `arg_image` are NULL before [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnext iteration[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Maintains the fuzzer's ability to test argument parsing across [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preserves all existing memory management semantics[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Fixes the exact addresses mentioned in the AddressSanitizer report[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects & Mitigation[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effects**: [0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m expected, as:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- These variables are already set to NULL by `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in their initial [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstate[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer already manually resets other global state[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This just makes the reset explicit and prevents dangling pointers[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Testing**: After applying the fix:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Run the fuzzer with the provided testcase to verify the double-free is resolved[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Run extended fuzzing to ensure no new issues are introduced[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Verify that normal systemctl operations are unaffected [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthey don't use the fuzzer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Issues[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhile reviewing the codebase, I noted similar patterns in other fuzzers, but they [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdon't exhibit the same issue because they either:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Don't reuse variables that manage their own memory lifecycle[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Don't have variables registered with `freep` that are modified by functions like [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, this fix pattern should be considered for any future fuzzers that:[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Call `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` between iterations[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Reuse global variables registered with static destructors[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Have those variables modified by functions that free old values[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/13/26 08:14:42][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=842637;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=966480;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95msystemd[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpd73uxs45[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz-systemctl-parse-argv -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer double-free error occurring in the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function when fuzzing the systemctl argument parser. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror indicates that memory at address `[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m` is being freed twice: once [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `parse_path_argument` and once in `static_destruct`. A patch was attempted that [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreplaced the `free_and_replace` macro call with separate `free` and assignment [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations. However, after applying the patch, the same double-free error persists [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith an identical stack trace and memory address, indicating the patch did not [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresolve the underlying issue.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue manifests as an AddressSanitizer double-free error with the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollowing characteristics:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The double-free occurs at line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m in [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/work/build/../../src/systemd/src/shared/[0m[95mparse-argument.c[0m[39m` within the [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **First Free Operation**: The first free occurs in `static_destruct` called from[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at line [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m of `fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`. This happens [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring cleanup/destruction phase.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Second Free Operation**: The second free [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcausing the error[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m occurs in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` at line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m, called from `systemctl_parse_argv` at line [0m[1;36m732[0m[39m.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Memory Allocation**: The memory was originally allocated via `realloc` in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`path_extend_internal`, which was called by `path_make_absolute_cwd` at line [0m[1;36m72[0m[39m of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_argument.c`, and then subsequently used in `parse_path_argument`.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Call Flow**: The sequence is:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `systemctl_parse_argv` → `parse_path_argument` → [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`path_make_absolute_cwd` → `path_extend_internal` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mallocates memory[0m[1;39m)[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Later, `parse_path_argument` attempts to free this memory[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Finally, `static_destruct` in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` also attempts to free [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same memory[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified the `parse_path_argument` function in [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/shared/parse-argument.c` starting at line [0m[1;36m77[0m[39m. The original code:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas changed to:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*arg = p;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis change essentially expanded the `free_and_replace` macro into explicit [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations. However, the line number in the error [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m68[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m indicates the error [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs earlier in the function, not at the patched location [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m77[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m81[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the exact same error occurs:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory address being double-freed: `[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m`[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same stack trace showing the error at line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m of `parse_path_argument`[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same deduplication tokens indicating identical error conditions[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The error still shows the first free in `static_destruct` and the second free in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` at line [0m[1;36m68[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m reference suggests the issue occurs at a different location in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction than where the patch was applied [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m77[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m81[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo gain a holistic view of this issue, the following areas should be investigated:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Complete `parse_path_argument` function**: Examine the entire function, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparticularly focusing on line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m and the code path leading to it. The error occurs [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m, but the patch was applied at line [0m[1;36m77[0m[39m, suggesting the issue may be in an[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mearlier conditional branch.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Ownership semantics**: Investigate the ownership model for the `*arg` [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter. Determine whether the caller retains ownership after calling [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument`, and whether the function is expected to transfer or share [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mownership of the allocated memory.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **static_destruct mechanism**: Examine how `static_destruct` works in [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/basic/static-destruct.h` at line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m, and what data structures it's attempting [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto free. Understand why it's trying to free memory that was allocated within [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument`.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Fuzzer harness**: While not the root cause, review [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mparticularly lines [0m[1;36m58[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m74[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to understand the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlifecycle of arguments and what state is being cleaned up in `static_destruct`.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **`free_and_replace` macro**: Examine the implementation of the [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`free_and_replace` macro to understand its semantics and why simply expanding it [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmanually doesn't resolve the issue.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Multiple parse calls**: Investigate whether `parse_path_argument` might be [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled multiple times on the same `*arg` pointer, or if there's shared state that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcould lead to the same memory being tracked in multiple places.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Conditional paths in parse_path_argument**: The code shows conditions like [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`suppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` that may free `p` before the return statement. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mUnderstanding all branches and their memory management implications is crucial.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* argv[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[39m should always be present, but may be [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mzero-length. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mstrv_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39margv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m1024[0m[1;39m)[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* oss-fuzz reports timeouts which are caused by [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mappending to a very long strv.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:                           * The code is indeed not very efficient, but it's [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdesigned for normal command-line[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:                           * use, where we don't expect more than a dozen of [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mentries. The fact that it is[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:                           * slow with ~100k entries is not particularly [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minteresting. Let's just refuse such[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:                           * long command lines. *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mgetenv_bool[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"SYSTEMD_FUZZ_OUT[0m[1;33mPUT[0m[32m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:                orig_stdout_fd = [0m[1;35mfcntl[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mfileno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, F_DUPFD_CLOEXEC, [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:                if [0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_stdout_fd < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:                        [0m[1;35mlog_warning_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_stdout_fd, [0m[32m"Failed to duplicate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mfd 1: %m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:                else[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:                        [0m[1;35massert_se[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mfreopen[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"/dev/null"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"w"[0m[39m, stdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:                opterr = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* do not print errors *[0m[35m/[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* We need to reset some global state manually here since libfuzzer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfeeds a single process with[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:         * multiple inputs, so we might carry over state from previous [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvocations that can trigger[0m                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:        arg_transport = BUS_TRANSPORT_LOCAL;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:        r = [0m[1;35msystemctl_dispatch_parse_argv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mstrv_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39margv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, argv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mrelease_busses[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* We open the bus for communication with logind.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                           * It needs to be closed to avoid apparent leaks. *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
