[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse args: %m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:        else[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mlog_info[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr == [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"Done!"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"Action!"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_stdout_fd >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35massert_se[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mfreopen[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mFORMAT_PROC_FD_PATH[0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_stdout_fd[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m"w"[0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mrelease_busses[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* We open the bus for communication with logind.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                           * It needs to be closed to avoid apparent leaks. *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmac_selinux_finish[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Call static destructors to do global state cleanup. We do it here, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand not in fuzz-main.c so that[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:         * any global state is destroyed between fuzzer runs. *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m106[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m105:c[0m[39mhar *arg_root = NULL;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m106:c[0m[39mhar *arg_image = NULL;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:136[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m137[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m136[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_root, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m137[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_image, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/shared/parse-argument.[0m[1;92mc:67[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m69[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misempty[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m107[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:static inline void [0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fundamental/macro-fundamental.h:[0m[1;36m399[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m404[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m399[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmemory[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                           \[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m400[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m{[0m[39m                                      \[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m401[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmemory[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;                   \[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m402[0m[39m:                [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtypeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmemory[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m NULL;          \[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m403[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m404[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter thoroughly examining the code snippets and evaluation report, I've identified[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe root cause of the persistent double-free issue:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe issue is NOT in `src/shared/parse-argument.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhere the double-free [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmanifests[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but rather in the **fuzzer harness** at [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`. The problem occurs because:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Fuzzer reuses the same process**: Unlike normal programs that exit after [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, the fuzzer loops back for multiple iterations[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`freep` doesn't NULL pointers**: The `freep` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m107[0m[39m of [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/basic/alloc-util.h`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` but doesn't set `*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp = [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNULL`[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Dangling pointers persist**: After `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` frees `arg_root` and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`arg_image`, these globals still contain the old pointer values[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Subsequent iteration triggers double-free**: When `parse_path_argument` is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled with an empty string, it tries to free the dangling pointer at line [0m[1;36m68[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to fix the symptom in `parse_path_argument` by:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adding `_cleanup_free_` to local variable `p`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifying the `suppress_root` logic[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis didn't work because:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The double-free occurs at line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m when `path` is empty, BEFORE `p` is even [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The root cause is dangling pointers in global variables after [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, not the logic in `parse_path_argument`[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifying a library function doesn't address the fuzzer-specific lifecycle issue[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Insight[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe comment at lines [0m[1;36m52[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m56[0m[39m of `fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c` explicitly states: [0m[32m"We [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mneed to reset some global state manually here since libfuzzer feeds a single [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mprocess with multiple inputs..."[0m[39m The code already resets `optind` and [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`arg_transport`, but it **fails to reset the freed pointer globals** after [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Location of Fix[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix must be in `src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`, specifically after [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m where `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Steps[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **After `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call in the fuzzer** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m of [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add explicit NULL assignments for all[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mglobal variables that were freed by static destructors.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Variables to reset** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbased on lines [0m[1;36m130[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m143[0m[39m of `src/systemctl/systemctl.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_root` - uses `freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m136[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_image` - uses `freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m137[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_types` - uses `strv_freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m130[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_states` - uses `strv_freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m131[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_properties` - uses `strv_freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m132[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_wall` - uses `strv_freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m134[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_clean_what` - uses `strv_freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m141[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `arg_image_policy` - uses `image_policy_freep` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m143[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Variables NOT to reset** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthey use `unsetp` which already NULLs the pointer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `_arg_job_mode`, `arg_kill_whom`, `arg_reboot_argument`, `arg_host`, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`arg_boot_loader_entry`, `arg_drop_in`[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Detailed Patch[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn `src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`, after line [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[39m* Call static destructors to do global state cleanup. We do it here, and not in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz-main.c so that[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * any global state is destroyed between fuzzer runs. *[0m[35m/[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[39m* Reset global pointers to NULL after static destruction to prevent double-free.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * The destructor functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfreep, strv_freep, image_policy_freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m free memory but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdon't[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * NULL the pointers, which causes double-free issues in subsequent fuzzer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39miterations when[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * parse_path_argument and similar functions try to free the old values. *[0m[35m/[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_types = NULL;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_states = NULL;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_properties = NULL;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_wall = NULL;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_root = NULL;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_image = NULL;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_clean_what = NULL;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_image_policy = NULL;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is Optimal[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause**: Fixes the dangling pointer issue at its source [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzzer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstate management[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, not the symptom[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Minimal Impact**: Changes only the fuzzer harness, doesn't modify production [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode or library functions[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Pattern**: The fuzzer already resets some globals [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m56[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; this extends that pattern[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Safe for All Variables**: Resetting pointers to NULL after they're freed is [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malways safe[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Preserves Existing Logic**: Doesn't modify `parse_path_argument` or any memory[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmanagement utilities[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **No changes to production code**: `parse_path_argument`, `freep`, and other [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions remain unchanged[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Maintains destructor semantics**: Static destructors still work as designed for[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnormal programs[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Fuzzer-specific solution**: Only affects the fuzzer workflow, which has unique [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrequirements[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issue[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Prevents dangling pointers**: After `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` frees memory, we [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately NULL the pointers[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Safe for subsequent calls**: When the next iteration calls [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument`, it sees NULL instead of dangling pointers[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Idempotent**: `[0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mNULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with `*arg == [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNULL` are both safe operations[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**[0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m expected** because:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer already calls `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to reset state[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Setting freed pointers to NULL is a standard defensive programming practice[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- These globals are re-initialized during argument parsing in the next iteration[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No other code runs between `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and the next fuzzer iteration[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer already follows this pattern at lines [0m[1;36m55[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m56[0m[39m:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptind = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* this tells the getopt machinery to reinitialize *[0m[35m/[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_transport = BUS_TRANSPORT_LOCAL;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOur fix extends this manual state reset to include the freed pointer globals.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/13/26 08:32:39][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=501634;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=556554;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz-systemctl-parse-argv -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASAN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m double-free error occurring in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function when the `fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv` fuzzer runs. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe memory at address `[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m` is being freed twice: once in the cleanup [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode at the end of `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` via `static_destruct`, and once [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplicitly in the `parse_path_argument` function. A patch was attempted that [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanged the memory management approach in `parse_path_argument` by using [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`_cleanup_free_` attribute and modifying the logic when `suppress_root && [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is true. However, after applying the patch, the same double-free [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror persists at the same memory location, indicating the patch did not resolve [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe underlying issue.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer `fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv` triggers an AddressSanitizer double-free [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror with the following characteristics:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Error Details:**[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Error Type**: AddressSanitizer double-free on address `[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Scariness Score**: [0m[1;36m42[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble-free[0m[1;39m)[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Thread**: T0 [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmain thread[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Call Stack Analysis:**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe double-free occurs in the following execution path:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. First free at line [0m[1;92m68:24[0m[39m in `src/shared/parse-argument.c` within the [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Called from `systemctl_parse_argv` at line [0m[1;92m732:29[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Called from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at line [0m[1;92m58:13[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Memory Lifecycle:**[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Allocation**: The memory was allocated via `realloc` in:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `path_extend_internal` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath-util.[0m[1;92mc:585:14[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `path_make_absolute_cwd` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath-util.[0m[1;92mc:92:21[0m[1;39m)[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `parse_path_argument` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mparse-argument.[0m[1;92mc:72:13[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **First Free**: Occurs in `static_destruct` at:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `static-destruct.h:[0m[1;92m95:25[0m[39m`[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.[0m[1;92mc:74:9[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Second Free [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDouble-free[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**: Occurs in:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `parse_path_argument` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mparse-argument.[0m[1;92mc:68:24[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified `src/shared/parse-argument.c` in the `parse_path_argument` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes Made:**[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Changed variable declaration from `char *p;` to `_cleanup_free_ char *p = NULL;`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto enable automatic cleanup[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Modified the conditional block for `suppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed from: `p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich frees `p` and returns NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed to: [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This explicitly frees `*arg` and returns early[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Intention**: The patch appears to attempt resolving the double-free by:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Using automatic cleanup for the local variable `p`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Explicitly managing the `*arg` pointer when the path should be suppressed[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Returning early to avoid the `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call at the end[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Result After Patch[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch did **not resolve** the issue. The exact same error occurs:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory address being double-freed: `[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m`[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same call stacks for both free operations[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same DEDUP_TOKENs indicating identical error patterns[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The error still occurs at line [0m[1;92m68:24[0m[39m in `parse_argument.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthough the line [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontent may have changed due to the patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Key Observation**: The line number [0m[1;39m([0m[1;92m68:24[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the error report remains the same [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdespite the patch modifying lines around line [0m[1;36m53[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m82[0m[39m. This suggests that either:[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The line numbers in the ASAN report refer to the original source before [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreprocessing/inlining[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The actual problematic free operation occurs elsewhere in the function[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The build may not have properly incorporated the patch[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand this issue, the following components should be examined:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`src/shared/parse-argument.c`**: [0m                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mzero-length. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mstrv_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39margv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m1024[0m[1;39m)[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* oss-fuzz reports timeouts which are caused by [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mappending to a very long strv.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:                           * The code is indeed not very efficient, but it's [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdesigned for normal command-line[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:                           * use, where we don't expect more than a dozen of [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mentries. The fact that it is[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:                           * slow with ~100k entries is not particularly [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minteresting. Let's just refuse such[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:                           * long command lines. *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mgetenv_bool[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"SYSTEMD_FUZZ_OUT[0m[1;33mPUT[0m[32m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:                orig_stdout_fd = [0m[1;35mfcntl[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mfileno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, F_DUPFD_CLOEXEC, [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* We need to reset some global state manually here since libfuzzer [0m     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandle paths that are passed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:         *[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:         * NOTE THAT THIS WILL FREE THE PREVIOUS ARGUMENT POINTER ON SUCCESS![0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:         * Hence, do not pass in uninitialized pointers.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:int [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *path, bool suppress_root, char **arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:        char *p;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:        int r;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandle paths that are passed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:         *[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:         * NOTE THAT THIS WILL FREE THE PREVIOUS ARGUMENT POINTER ON SUCCESS![0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:         * Hence, do not pass in uninitialized pointers.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misempty[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        r = [0m[1;35mpath_make_absolute_cwd[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath, &p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse path \"%s\" and make [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mit absolute: %m"[0m[39m, path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:                p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                           * It needs to be closed to avoid apparent leaks. *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmac_selinux_finish[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Call static destructors to do global state cleanup. We do it here, [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:         * any global state is destroyed between fuzzer runs. *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:        int r;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandle paths that are passed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:         *[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:         * NOTE THAT THIS WILL FREE THE PREVIOUS ARGUMENT POINTER ON SUCCESS![0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:         * Hence, do not pass in uninitialized pointers.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misempty[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
