[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse path \"%s\" and make [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mit absolute: %m"[0m[39m, path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mpath_simplify[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:                p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m81[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m54[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m66[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b, free_func[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m{[0m[39m                                      \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mtypeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m* _a = &[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;           \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mtypeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m* _b = &[0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;           \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mfree_func[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*_a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;                 \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:                *_a = *_b;                      \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:                *_b = NULL;                     \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:                [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;                              \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                  \[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b, free[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter analyzing the code snippets and evaluation report, I can now identify the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot cause of the double-free issue:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe double-free occurs because the fuzzer harness reuses a single process for [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmultiple fuzzing iterations, and:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Static destructors free memory but don't nullify pointers**: The `[0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction and `[0m[1;35mstrv_freep[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function only call `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` on the pointed-to memory [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut don't set the pointer itself to NULL.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Global state persistence across iterations**: When `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled at the end of each fuzzer iteration [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m74[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it frees memory for globals [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlike `arg_root` and `arg_image`, but these global variables retain dangling [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Dangling pointers violate function preconditions**: On the next fuzzer [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39miteration, when `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called with `&arg_root`, the function [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexpects `*arg` to either be NULL or point to valid allocated memory. Instead, it [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpoints to already-freed memory, causing a double-free when `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` tries to free it.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why the Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to fix the issue in `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` by:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adding `_cleanup_free_` to the local variable `p`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Modifying the early return logic for suppressed root paths[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, this approach was fundamentally wrong because:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The bug is NOT in `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` - this function is correctly [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplemented[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The bug is in the **fuzzer harness** which fails to properly reset global state [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbetween iterations[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` correctly documents its precondition: [0m[32m"do not pass in [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32muninitialized pointers"[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer violates this precondition by passing dangling pointers[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Correct Fix Strategy[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix must be applied to the fuzzer harness [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`, not to `src/shared/parse-argument.c`.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m**: Revert the previous incorrect patch to `src/shared/parse-argument.c` by[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrestoring the original implementation.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m**: After the `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call at line [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m in [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`, manually reset all global variables that were freed [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut not nullified to NULL. This includes:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_root` - uses `freep` which doesn't nullify[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_image` - uses `freep` which doesn't nullify  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_types` - uses `strv_freep` which doesn't nullify[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_states` - uses `strv_freep` which doesn't nullify[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_properties` - uses `strv_freep` which doesn't nullify[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_wall` - uses `strv_freep` which doesn't nullify[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_clean_what` - uses `strv_freep` which doesn't nullify[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `arg_image_policy` - uses `image_policy_freep` which doesn't nullify[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mVariables using `unsetp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlike `arg_kill_whom`, `arg_reboot_argument`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m don't [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneed manual reset because `unsetp` already sets them to NULL.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m**: The reset should be placed immediately after `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure clean state for the next fuzzer iteration.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Implementation Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### File: src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter line [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add the following code:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[39m* Reset all pointers that were freed by [0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but not nullified.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * This is necessary because libfuzzer reuses the same process for multiple[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m * inputs, and these globals would otherwise contain dangling pointers. *[0m[35m/[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_root = NULL;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_image = NULL;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_types = NULL;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_states = NULL;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_properties = NULL;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_wall = NULL;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_clean_what = NULL;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marg_image_policy = NULL;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### File: src/shared/parse-argument.c[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRevert the previous patch completely. The original implementation is correct:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *path, bool suppress_root, char **arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *p;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        int r;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to handle [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpaths that are passed[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         *[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         * NOTE THAT THIS WILL FREE THE PREVIOUS ARGUMENT POINTER ON SUCCESS![0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         * Hence, do not pass in uninitialized pointers.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misempty[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        r = [0m[1;35mpath_make_absolute_cwd[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath, &p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                return [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse path \"%s\" and make it [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mabsolute: %m"[0m[39m, path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mpath_simplify[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is the Optimal Approach[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Fixes the actual root cause**: The issue is in the fuzzer harness not [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmaintaining proper global state between iterations, not in the [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Preserves existing codebase logic**: The `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` function is [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly implemented and follows established patterns. Its documented precondition[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis legitimate.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Follows existing patterns**: The fuzzer already has a comment [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m52[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m54[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39macknowledging the need to [0m[32m"reset some global state manually"[0m[39m between iterations. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOur fix extends this existing pattern.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Minimal scope**: Only modifies the fuzzer harness, not production code. This [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis appropriate since the issue only manifests in the fuzzing context.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Addresses all affected variables**: By resetting all eight globals that use [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnon-nullifying destructors, we prevent similar issues from occurring with other [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mglobal variables.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issues[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Prevents dangling pointers**: By explicitly setting freed pointers to NULL, we [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure that on the next iteration, `[0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` receives either NULL or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma valid pointer, satisfying its precondition.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Maintains double-free safety**: When `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is called with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`*arg == NULL`, the `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mNULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` operation is safe and does nothing.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **No side effects on production code**: Since we're only modifying the fuzzer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness, there's no risk of affecting the behavior of the actual systemctl command [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor breaking existing tests.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect**: If new global variables with static destructors are added to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`systemctl.c` in the future, developers must remember to add corresponding reset [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstatements in the fuzzer.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Mitigation**: Add a code comment documenting this requirement. Additionally, the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomment already exists [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m52[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m54[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m establishing this pattern, so developers [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodifying this code should be aware of the need.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect**: [0m[3;35mNone[0m[39m for production code - this fix only affects the fuzzing [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in the Codebase[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer already resets some globals manually:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m55[0m[39m: `optind = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;` [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m56[0m[39m: `arg_transport = BUS_TRANSPORT_LOCAL;`[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOur fix follows this exact same pattern, extending it to cover all globals that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneed reset.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOther fuzzers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `fuzz-bootspec.c`, `fuzz-journal-remote.c`, [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fuzz-udev-rules.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m avoid this issue entirely by not using global variables with [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstatic destructors - they use local variables with `_cleanup_` attributes instead. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, refactoring `systemctl.c` to eliminate all global state is beyond the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscope of this fix.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         --- a/src/basic/alloc-util.h                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +++ b/src/basic/alloc-util.h                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-106[0m,[1;36m6[0m +[1;36m106[0m,[1;36m12[0m @@                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                  [1;35mfree[0m[1m([0m*[1m([0mvoid**[1m)[0m p[1m)[0m;                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m          [1m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +static inline void [1;35mfree_and_nullp[0m[1m([0mvoid *p[1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +        void **pp = [1m([0mvoid**[1m)[0mp;                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +        [1;35mfree[0m[1m([0m*pp[1m)[0m;                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +        *pp = NULL;                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +[1m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m          #define _cleanup_free_ [1;35m_cleanup_[0m[1m([0mfreep[1m)[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m          static inline bool [1;35msize_multiply_overflow[0m[1m([0msize_t size, size_t need[1m)[0m [1m{[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         --- a/src/systemctl/systemctl.c                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +++ b/src/systemctl/systemctl.c                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-133[0m,[1;36m8[0m +[1;36m133[0m,[1;36m8[0m @@                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m          [1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1m([0m_arg_job_mode, unsetp[1m)[0m;                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m          [1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1m([0marg_wall, strv_freep[1m)[0m;                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m          [1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1m([0marg_kill_whom, unsetp[1m)[0m;                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1m([0marg_root, freep[1m)[0m;                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1m([0marg_image, freep[1m)[0m;                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1m([0marg_root, free_and_nullp[1m)[0m;                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparse_path_argument[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95msystemd[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpd73uxs45[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz-systemctl-parse-argv -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASAN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m double-free error occurring in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function within the systemd codebase. The fuzzer [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv` triggers this error when parsing command-line [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marguments. A patch was attempted to resolve the double-free by modifying the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function in `src/shared/parse-argument.c`, introducing the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`_cleanup_free_` attribute to automatically manage memory for the variable `p` and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanging the logic when handling the suppress_root condition. However, after [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying the patch, the same AddressSanitizer double-free error persists at the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame location, indicating that the patch did not successfully resolve the issue.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue manifests as an AddressSanitizer double-free error with the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollowing characteristics:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The double-free occurs at line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m in [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/work/build/../../src/systemd/src/shared/[0m[95mparse-argument.c[0m[39m` within the [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` function.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Call Stack for the First Free**: [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The first free occurs in `static_destruct` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/basic/static-destruct.h:[0m[1;36m95[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This is called from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.[0m[1;92mc:74[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer test function appears to be cleaning up static resources[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Call Stack for the Second Free [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDouble-Free[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m**:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The second free happens in `parse_path_argument` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/shared/parse-argument.[0m[1;92mc:68[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `systemctl_parse_argv` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat `src/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:732[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ultimately triggered by `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.[0m[1;92mc:58[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Memory Allocation**: The memory at address `[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m` was originally [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated via `realloc` in:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `path_extend_internal` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat `src/basic/path-util.[0m[1;92mc:585[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `path_make_absolute_cwd` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat `src/basic/path-util.[0m[1;92mc:92[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Then from `parse_path_argument` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat `src/shared/parse-argument.[0m[1;92mc:72[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Temporal Ordering**: The first free occurs during cleanup in [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`static_destruct`, followed by a second free attempt in `parse_path_argument`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcreating the double-free condition.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies `src/shared/parse-argument.c` in the `parse_path_argument` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Original Code**:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *path, bool suppress_root, char **arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char *p;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        int r;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39momitted for brevity[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mpath_simplify[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Patched Code**:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *path, bool suppress_root, char **arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        _cleanup_free_ char *p = NULL;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        int r;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39momitted for brevity[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mpath_simplify[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Key Changes**:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Declaration of `p` changed from `char *p;` to `_cleanup_free_ char *p = NULL;` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto enable automatic cleanup when the variable goes out of scope[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The conditional block for `suppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` now explicitly [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrees `*arg` and returns [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, rather than freeing `p`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The `[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call remains at the end for the normal case[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzer still encounters the identical double-free [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Same Error Location**: The double-free still occurs at line [0m[1;36m68[0m[39m in [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthough the line number in the stack trace now shows `[0m[1;92m68:24[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Identical Call Stacks**: Both the first free [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `static_destruct`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msecond free [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `parse_path_argument`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m follow the same execution paths[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Same Memory Address**: The double-free still involves the same memory address [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x502000007310[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Same DEDUP Tokens**: The deduplication tokens remain identical, indicating the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame fundamental issue[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo gain a holistic understanding of this issue, the following components should be [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexamined:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`src/basic/static-destruct.h`**: Line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m where the first free occurs in [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`static_destruct` function. Understanding how static cleanup interacts with [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdynamically allocated memory is crucial.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`src/systemctl/fuzz-systemctl-parse-argv.c`**: Lines [0m[1;36m58[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m74[0m[39m where the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzer test function calls `systemctl_parse_argv` and `static_destruct`. The [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlifecycle and ownership of the `arg` parameter needs investigation.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **`src/systemctl/systemctl.c`**: Line [0m[1;36m732[0m[39m where `parse_path_argument` is called [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom `systemctl_parse_argv`. The context and ownership of the arguments passed to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis function should be examined.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **`src/basic/path-util.c`**: Lines [0m[1;36m92[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m585[0m[39m in `path_make_absolute_cwd` and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`path_extend_internal` where the memory is originally allocated. Understanding the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory allocation pattern is essential.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **`src/shared/parse-argument.c`**: The complete implementation of [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`parse_path_argument`, particularly:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the `**arg` parameter is used and who owns the memory[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The interaction between `_cleanup_free_` attribute and `free_and_replace`[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether `free_and_replace` handles ownership transfer correctly when `p` has [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `_cleanup_free_` attribute[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Memory Ownership Model**: The relationship between the caller [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`systemctl_parse_argv`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the callee [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`parse_path_argument`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m regarding who owns [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand is responsible for freeing the memory pointed to by `*arg` needs clarification.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Static Resources**: How the fuzzer's static resource cleanup interacts with [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdynamically allocated memory that might be registered or tracked as static [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresources.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m[39m-systemctl-parse-argv[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:                           * The code is indeed not very efficient, but it's [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:int [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *path, bool suppress_root, char **arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:        char *p;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:        int r;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandle paths that are passed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:         *[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:         * NOTE THAT THIS WILL FREE THE PREVIOUS ARGUMENT POINTER ON SUCCESS![0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:         * Hence, do not pass in uninitialized pointers.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misempty[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        r = [0m[1;35mpath_make_absolute_cwd[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath, &p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [32mit absolute: %m"[0m[39m, path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mpath_simplify[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:                p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m81[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m54[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m66[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
