[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:int [0m[1;35mparse_path_argument[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *path, bool suppress_root, char **arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:        char *p;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:        int r;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandle paths that are passed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:         *[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:         * NOTE THAT THIS WILL FREE THE PREVIOUS ARGUMENT POINTER ON SUCCESS![0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:         * Hence, do not pass in uninitialized pointers.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35misempty[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                *arg = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        r = [0m[1;35mpath_make_absolute_cwd[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpath, &p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:                return [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse path \"%s\" and make [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32mit absolute: %m"[0m[39m, path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mpath_simplify[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39msuppress_root && [0m[1;35mempty_or_root[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:                p = [0m[1;35mmfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m81[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m54[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m66[0m                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mfree_and_replace_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39ma, b, free_func[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  \[0m                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:        arg_transport = BUS_TRANSPORT_LOCAL;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:        r = [0m[1;35msystemctl_dispatch_parse_argv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mstrv_length[0m[1;39m([0m[39margv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, argv[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mr < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mlog_error_errno[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr, [0m[32m"Failed to parse args: %m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:        else[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:                [0m[1;35mlog_info[0m[1;39m([0m[39mr == [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"Done!"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"Action!"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstdout[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mrelease_busses[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* We open the bus for communication with logind.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:                           * It needs to be closed to avoid apparent leaks. *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmac_selinux_finish[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Call static destructors to do global state cleanup. We do it here, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand not in fuzz-main.c so that[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:         * any global state is destroyed between fuzzer runs. *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:         * This function is intended to be used in command line parsers, to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandle paths that are passed[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:         * in. It makes the path absolute, and reduces it to NULL if omitted or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroot [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe latter optionally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m98[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m109[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:static inline void [0m[1;35munsetp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* A trivial [0m[32m"destructor"[0m[39m that can be used in cases where we want to[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:         * unset a pointer from a _cleanup_ function. *[0m[35m/[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:        *[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp = NULL;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:static inline void [0m[1;35mfreep[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:#define _cleanup_free_ [0m[1;35m_cleanup_[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfreep[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m106[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m105:c[0m[39mhar *arg_root = NULL;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m106:c[0m[39mhar *arg_image = NULL;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:136[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m137[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m136[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_root, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m137[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_image, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis Complete[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter examining the code, I now have a clear picture. The issue is that `arg_root` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `arg_image` are registered with `freep` which doesn't nullify pointers, unlike [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `const char *` variables that use `unsetp`.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Final Fix Strategy[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**The optimal solution**: Create a new cleanup function `free_and_nullp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msimilar [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto `unsetp` but with actual freeing[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and use it for the static destructor [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregistration of `arg_root` and `arg_image`.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Steps:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Add a new function `free_and_nullp` in `src/basic/alloc-util.h`** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m, alongside `freep` and `unsetp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This function will free the memory AND set the pointer to NULL[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar to `unsetp` but actually frees before nullifying[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Implementation:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static inline void [0m[1;35mfree_and_nullp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         void **pp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid**[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         *pp = NULL;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Update the static destructor registration in `src/systemctl/systemctl.c`** [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m136[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m137[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change from `[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_root, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_root, free_and_nullp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change from `[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_image, freep[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mSTATIC_DESTRUCTOR_REGISTER[0m[1;39m([0m[39marg_image, free_and_nullp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Justification:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Why this is optimal**:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Doesn't modify the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mforbidden by requirements[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Doesn't modify `parse_path_argument` logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich is correct by design[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Follows the existing pattern in the codebase [0m[1;39m([0m[39msee `unsetp` usage for similar [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcases[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Minimal impact - only affects the two problematic variables[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Preserves all existing functionality[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **How it preserves existing logic**:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `parse_path_argument` expects `*arg` to be either NULL or valid pointer - this[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfix ensures it's NULL after cleanup[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The static destructor mechanism still works as intended[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other code paths remain unchanged[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **How it addresses the issue**:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls `[0m[1;35mfree_and_nullp[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&arg_root[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, the pointer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbecomes NULL instead of dangling[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the next fuzzer iteration, when `parse_path_argument` calls [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mfree_and_replace[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*arg, p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, it safely frees NULL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno-op[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead of attempting to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfree already-freed memory[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This eliminates the double-free error[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Potential side effects and mitigation**:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Minimal side effects since we're only creating a new function and using it for[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtwo specific variables[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other uses of `freep` remain unchanged[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The behavior change only affects the fuzzer scenario where `[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis explicitly called between iterations[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In normal [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnon-fuzzer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m usage, this has no impact since the program exits after[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mstatic_destruct[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Similar solutions in the codebase**:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `unsetp` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m98[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m103[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m demonstrates this exact pattern for [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`const char *` pointers[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Many variables in systemctl.c already use `unsetp` for similar reasons [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m133[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m135[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m140[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m142[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This fix extends the same safety pattern to dynamically allocated non-const [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Code References Used in Fix Strategy:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/basic/alloc-util.h:[0m[1;36m98[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m109[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:105[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m106[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/systemctl/systemctl.[0m[1;92mc:136[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m137[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.END                      ]8;id=201020;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=933843;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
